name: Cat
description: A cat is a small, agile mammal known for its independence, sharp claws, and keen hunting instincts.

name: Elephant
description: An elephant is a large, gentle herbivore known for its long trunk, tusks, and exceptional memory.

name: Monkey
description: A monkey is a highly agile and intelligent primate known for its playful behavior and dexterous hands.

name: Lion
description: A lion is a large, powerful carnivore known for its majestic mane and status as the king of the jungle.

name: Dolphin
description: A dolphin is an intelligent, social marine mammal known for its playful behavior and echolocation abilities

name: Panda
description: A panda is a bear-like mammal known for its distinctive black-and-white fur and preference for bamboo

name: Kangaroo
description: A kangaroo is a large marsupial native to Australia, known for its powerful hind legs and distinctive hopping movement.

name: Giraffe
description: A giraffe is an exceptionally tall herbivore recognized for its long neck and legs, and distinctive spotted coat.
